synopsis.text: Flower, an android, notices that her master Keiichiro seems tired lately. Wanting to do something nice for him, she decides to try cooking a meal. However, cooking is not one of Flower's strengths. After seeing a cooking show on TV, she heads to the shops to buy vegetables, determined to find the perfect ingredients to cheer up Keiichiro. This extra episode provides a glimpse into the daily life of Flower and Keiichiro. It shows Flower's caring nature as she selflessly tries to help her master, even if her skills fall short. Her attempts highlight the innocence and good intentions of this naive android. Though the cooking doesn't go smoothly, the thought behind it is sweet. This episode offers a charming look at the bond between Flower and Keiichiro.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
